Flavored Toothpicks | 24-pack.productDescription:

Preserve® 2 Go.productDescription:
At Preserve, we love it when ideas transform into actual products. After three years of research, development, and prototyping, we’re proud to launch a durable reusable food storage container aimed at the takeout market that’s made in the USA with recycled polypropylene plastic: it's called Preserve® 2 Go. Our aim with Preserve 2 Go is to transform the takeout food experience by shifting to a more sustainable, eco-friendly system that eliminates the waste of millions of disposable to-go containers.

					
						The Preserve® 2 Go is on the leading edge of a move to reusables. Reusable bags have significantly gained in popularity, and reusable drink containers are enabling consumers to move away from disposable cups. With the Preserve® 2 Go line, we’re changing the culture of single-use disposables.


	Made in the U.S.A.
	Made with 50% recycled plastic
	BPA-free
	Microwave-durable
	Maximum sealability to minimize leaks
	9" × 9" × 3"
	3 compartments
	Compatible with OZZI collection system
	NSF Certified

Compostable Straws | 50 Count.productDescription:
Preserve compostables are made from plants and return to the soil when the party is over. These brightly colored paper straws are non-toxic and manufactured in the USA from renewable resources.  For some gatherings single-use products make sense, and we are excited to offer single-use products that are made from renewable resources and are lighter on the earth

					
						Introducing Preserve Compostables:

Friends? Check. Cake? Check. Festive drinks? Check. Landfill? No way! Preserve Compostables are made from plants and can return to the soil when you're done. Now that's the way to party. Learn more about this new line here. 

Features:


	
	50 compostable straws
	
	
	Backyard compostable
	
	
	Non-GMO
	
	
	Gluten Free
	
	
	Manufactured in the USA with domestic and imported raw materials
	
	
	Renewable
	
	
	No plastic or wax
	
	
	Not intended for hot liquids
	
	
	Warning: choking hazard. Not for children under 3 years of age.
	


Why single-use tableware?

Preserve has made durable, reusable products from recycled #5 plastic for 20 years. So why the switch to single-use, compostable tableware? Since 2003, Preserve has been researching plant-based tableware products, and we finally developed the right line! We also believe that the composting infrastructure has come a long way since 2003.  For some gatherings single-use products make sense, and we are excited to offer single-use products that are made from renewable resources and are lighter on the earth.

Everyday Tableware Set | Pack for 4.productDescription:
Backstory

When Preserve set out to make Everyday Tableware, we wanted to ensure that it could be a permanent member of your household. We agonized and analyzed as we added each gram of plastic to the product to arrive at the perfect balance of sturdiness while minimizing the amount of precious recycled resources we used. Material isn't the only thing that creates strength and durability; the curved line that sweeps across the cups, bowls and plates that makes all the difference in their strength. Learn more about how we designed the Everyday line in this case study found here.

					
						This tableware pack includes the following:


	9.5” plate - set of 4
	16 oz. bowl - set of 4
	16 oz. cup - set of 4


Features:


	Designed to last. Reuse forever...or return it to us and we will!
	Can withstand hundreds, if not thousands of uses
	Curved shapes for improved sturdiness
	Textured eating surface on plate conceals knife marks
	Made of 100% recycled #5 plastic, 100% recyclable


Description:

Preserve Everyday Tableware is perfect for everything from casual family meals to al fresco dining. The plates have been specially designed for ease of use, shaped and weighted for stability and resistance to spills. They are also designed to be dishwasher safe and durable enough to last decades–they can literally be used thousands of times. For this reason, we chose a textured material on the plate to hide utensil marks. 

					
							“Just wanted to say thanks, Preserve Products, for making our Memorial Day party a blast and low-impact on the environment! We've had our Preserve plates for many years and haul them out for camping and parties. Colorful and durable--perfect!” – Andrea C., Silver Spring, MD.

A great investment

The Preserve Everyday Shareware Pack is a smart investment. Not only does it eliminate the waste of single-use paper or plastic dishware, but it also saves money over time. We compared the costs of buying and dishwashing Preserve’s Everyday Shareware Pack with buying and throwing away typical disposable brands. Our pack pays for itself in only 6 events!

	Designed to last. Reuse forever...or return it to us and we will!
	Can withstand hundreds, if not thousands of uses

ChicoBag® Tote:


	Color: Smoked Pearl
	Large capacity reusable shoulder tote
	Entire bag stuffs into an inside pocket for convenient storage

Overview:

You'll have a party at your fingertips with the new Preserve Everyday Shareware Pack. With 20 table settings that easily fit in a stylish bag from ChicoBag®, the Shareware Pack is perfect for hosting your own events and sharing with your friends, neighbors, and community when they’re hosting. At the end of the event, simply throw the table settings in the dishwasher and conveniently pack them back into the ChicoBag® tote. You’ll be ready to entertain at a moment’s notice! 

					
							Shareware

The Preserve Shareware Packs were inspired by our customers. We heard from parents, businesses and community groups who were sharing and circulating sets of Preserve Tableware within their communities for a variety of events. We hope you'll share your Preserve Tableware too, and in doing so, save yourself, friends and family the cost of buying disposables while encouraging reuse within your community.

On the Go Tableware Set | Pack for 8.productDescription:
Backstory

Being sustainably minded, we used to wash our old "disposable" plastic dishes until we got frustrated with the breakage and warping and decided to make our own line of plastic tableware. On the Go is light enough to carry on a picnic, but sturdy enough to last. Some people have reported using their On the Go set for four years and counting!

					
						This Tableware Pack includes the following:


	 7” small plates - Set of 10
	10.5” large plates - Set of 8
	16 oz. cups - Set of 10
	Cutlery Set: 8 knives, 8 forks and 8 spoons​


 

Features:


	Lightweight but sturdy
	Can withstand hundreds and hundreds of uses
	Made of 100% recycled #5 plastic, 100% recyclable


 

Description:

The next time you throw a party or plan a picnic, consider On the Go plates. They are lightweight and festive but can also last…and last. We designed them to be dishwasher safe and withstand hundreds of uses. Unlike typical plastic dishware, they won’t crack, warp or break.

On the Go is also a smart investment. Sold in packs of 8, the plates are affordable enough to have a whole party’s worth on hand. At the end of your event, simply gather everything up and throw it in the dishwasher. You’ll be ready to entertain at a moment’s notice!

For some gatherings single-use products make sense, and we are excited to offer single-use products that are made from renewable resources and are lighter on the earth.

Everyday Cup | 4 Count.productDescription:
Backstory

When Preserve set out to make Everyday Tableware, we wanted to ensure that it could be a permanent member of your household. We agonized and analyzed as we added each gram of plastic to the product to arrive at the perfect balance of sturdiness while minimizing the amount of precious recycled resources we used. Material isn't the only thing that creates strength and durability; the curved line that sweeps across the cup that makes all the difference in its strength. Learn more about how we designed the Everyday line in this case study found here.

					
						Features: 


	16 oz. cup 
	Designed to last. Reuse forever (or return it to us and we will).
	Curved shape for improved sturdiness
	100% recycled, BPA and melamine free


Description:

Preserve Everyday Tableware is perfect for everything from casual family meals to al fresco dining. The cups have been specially designed for ease of use, shaped and weighted for stability and resistance to spills. They are also designed to be dishwasher safe and durable enough to last decades–they can literally be used thousands of times. For this reason, we chose a textured material on the plate to hide utensil marks.

Small On The Go Plates | 10 Count.productDescription:
Backstory

Being sustainably minded, we used to wash our old "disposable" plastic dishes until we got frustrated with the breakage and warping and decided to make our own line of plastic tableware. On the Go is light enough to carry on a picnic, but sturdy enough to last. Some people have reported using their On the Go set for four years and counting!

					
						Features: 


	7” small plate 
	Lightweight but sturdy
	Can withstand hundreds and hundreds of uses
	Made of 100% recycled #5 plastic, 100% recyclable


Description

The next time you throw a party or plan a picnic, consider On the Go plates. They are lightweight and festive but can also last…and last. We designed them to be dishwasher safe and withstand hundreds of uses. Unlike typical plastic dishware, they won’t crack, warp or break.

On the Go is also a smart investment. Sold in packs of 10, the small plates are affordable enough to have a whole party’s worth on hand. At the end of your event, simply gather everything up and throw it in the dishwasher. You’ll be ready to entertain at a moment’s notice!

Dopper® Steel.productDescription:
The water bottle on a mission is now available in a robust stainless steel version! Dopper® Steel holds 27 oz, almost twice as much as Dopper® Original, but features the same beautiful design. Whether you’re an outdoor enthusiast or an urban adventurer, Dopper® Steel is the perfect bottle to keep you hydrated all day. As always, for every bottle sold Dopper® gives 5% of their sales to water and sanitation projects to increase access to clean drinking water worldwide through the Dopper® Foundation.

					
						Choose to drink from your Dopper® as a bottle or as a carafe with a cup! The design makes it easy to wash and refill.


	Base & Cap Stainless Steel* & Neck #7 ABS *
	27 oz
	3.75" d × 10.25" h
	BPA-Free
	Dishwasher safe up to 149°F
	Produced responsibly in China*


A portion of sales from each Dopper® bottle supports the work of The Dopper® Foundation

The Dopper® Foundation was established in 2013 with the following mission: Bring safe, clean water to underserved communities and educate the public about waste management, water scarcity, and sanitation. In Nepal, one of the world’s poorest countries, 11% of the population is left without access to clean drinking water. The Dopper® Foundation allocates 5% of its net proceeds to programs that create new sources of clean drinking water and provide education about sanitation to families in developing countries. For more details about the Foundation’s work, visit: http://us.dopper.com/en/foundation.  

*Dopper is a member of the Business Social Compliance Initiative, a leading supply chain management system that supports companies to drive social compliance and improvements within the factories and farms in their global supply chains. Dopper’s Chinese manufacturer is audited by a third party based on the BSCI’s Code of Conduct. For more information on BSCI’s Code of Conduct, visit their website here.

Dopper® Gift Set.productDescription:
Preserve® and Dopper® have joined forces to bring you the reusable Dopper water bottle. Together, with you, we seek to increase access to clean drinking water worldwide through a beautifully designed bottle that’s fun to use, easy to wash and supports clean water initiatives with every Dopper purchased.

The Dopper gift set includes a Dopper® Orignal water bottle, a Water Cocktail recipe book, and Sport Cap. 

					
						Dopper® Gift Set includes


	15.25 oz Dopper® Original bottle
	A Sport Cap to turn your Dopper® into the ultimate sports bottle
	A Water Cocktail Book with fifteen recipes to give your water a little oomph 


Dopper® is a reusable bottle with a mission!


	Promotes the use of tap water and reduces the use of single-use plastic water bottles.
	Produced in Holland.
	Preserve offsets the emissions created from shipping Dopper to the USA.
	Recyclable through Preserve Gimme 5® and communities that accept #5 plastics (bottle base and lid).
	Both Preserve® and Dopper® are Certified B Corporations, dedicated to meeting rigorous standards of social and environmental performance, accountability, and transparency.
	For every bottle sold, Dopper® gives 5% of their sales to water and sanitation projects to increase access to clean drinking water worldwide through the Dopper® Foundation.
	The Dopper® Foundation has contributed over $100,000 to date for sanitation projects and education programs in Nepal and other developing countries.
	Dopper® received honorable mention from The Red Dot Design Awards, an international quality label for design excellence.
